Download Mirrors (Torrent)

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on Trials.Rising-RUNE ISO release: rune-trials.rising.iso (29,187,637,248 bytes)
  • All DLCs/inventory items are included and activated with special save files, installed by default
  • If saves unlock by my installer saves for some reason (usually it’s antivirus), copy “Trials Rising” folder from “_DLC Unlock\Documents(inventory)” to “C:\Users\Your Username\Documents” folder and “Ubisoft” folder from “_DLC Unlock\Public Documents(DLC save)” to “C:\Users\Public\Documents” folder
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of Japanese and Chinese videos
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 27.2 to 15.9~17 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 6-12 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 27.2 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
Explore over-the-top action and physics-bending motorcycle racing in the latest opus of the Trials franchise. All new features, more competitions and more tracks means new challenges.

Game Features

  • RIDE ALL OVER THE WORLD – Ride challenging tracks around the world â€“ from the Great Wall of China and New York City to the Eiffel Tower and everywhere in between. With the new hilarious Tandem Bike, get your friends and try to control one bike with two riders.
  • COMPETITION IS EVERYWHERE – From your local backyard to worldwide stadiums, defeat all your opponents online and rise to glory.
  • INFINITE CUSTOMIZATION – Create and share unique levels in Track Central using over 10,000 items available. Possibilities are endless – and so is the fun.

The post Trials Rising: Gold Edition + All DLCs/Inventory Items appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Download Mirrors (Torrent)

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on GOG v1.0.1.2 release: 31.5 GB
  • Game version: v1.0.1.2 GOG; All DLCs are included and activated
  • GOG registry preserved for compatibility with possible GOG patches
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature – you can download and install only languages you need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 31.5 to 12.9~20 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes (for any single language): ~7 minutes on 16-threads CPU; ~12 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~16 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 35.9 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings or by copying “goggame-1926077727.info” file from subfolders of “_Language Switcher” folder to the game root
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description

After uncovering an ancient mystery, Lara must explore the most treacherous and remote regions of Siberia to find the secret of immortality before a ruthless organization known as Trinity. Lara must use her wits and survival skills, form new alliances, and ultimately embrace her destiny as the Tomb Raider. Experience high-octane action moments, conquer beautifully hostile environments, engage in brutal guerilla combat, and explore awe-inspiring deadly tombs in the evolution of survival action. In â€œRise of the Tomb Raider,â€ Lara becomes more than a survivor as she embarks on her first Tomb Raiding expedition.

Game Features
Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration includes the base game and Season Pass featuring all-new content. Explore Croft Manor in the new â€œBlood Tiesâ€ story, then defend it against a zombie invasion in â€œLaraâ€™s Nightmareâ€. Survive extreme conditions with a friend in the new online Co-Op Endurance mode, and brave the new â€œExtreme Survivorâ€ difficulty. Also features an outfit and weapon inspired by Tomb Raider III, and 5 classic Lara skins. Existing DLC will challenge you to explore a new tomb that houses an ancient terror in Baba Yaga: The Temple of the Witch, and combat waves of infected predators in Cold Darkness Awakened.

New and recently updated features introduced in Rise of the Tomb Raider are:

  • Upgraded NVIDIA DLSS to the latest version
  • Various stability fixes, especially when using DX12
  • Updates to multiplayer infrastructure to use Epic Online Services. Use of an Epic account is entirely optional
  • Denuvo-less

Game Features

  • Laraâ€™s Journey â€“ Lara uncovers an ancient mystery that places her in the cross-hairs of a ruthless organization known as Trinity. As she races to find the secret before Trinity, the trail leads to a myth about the Lost City of Kitezh. Lara knows she must reach the Lost City and its hidden secrets before Trinity. With that, she sets out for Siberia on her first Tomb Raiding expedition.
  • Woman vs. Wild â€“ In â€œRise of the Tomb Raider,â€ Lara battles with not only enemies from around the world, but the world itself. Hunt animals to craft weapons and scavenge for rare resources in densely populated ecosystems. Youâ€™ll encounter beautifully hostile environments, full of treacherous conditions and unstable landscapes that will require Lara to push her limits to the very edge.
  • Guerilla Combat – Use the environment to your advantage, scale trees and dive underwater to avoid or takedown enemies, configure Laraâ€™s gear, weapons, and ammo to suit your play style from stealth to guns blazing, craft explosives on the fly to sow chaos, and wield Laraâ€™s signature combat bows and climbing axe.
  • Return to Tomb Raiding â€“ Tombs are back, and theyâ€™re bigger and better than ever. In â€œRise of the Tomb Raiderâ€ youâ€™ll explore huge, awe-inspiring ancient spaces littered with deadly traps, solve dramatic environmental puzzles, and decipher ancient texts to reveal crypts as you take on a world filled with secrets to discover.

Included DLCs in the 20 Year Celeberation Edition:

  • BABA YAGA: THE TEMPLE OF THE WITCH – 3 hours of new story
  • ENDURANCE MODE: The ultimate test of survival
  • COLD DARKNESS AWAKENED: Battle waves of infected enemies
  • NEW STORY CHAPTER – BLOOD TIES: Explore Croft Manor to reclaim Lara’s legacy
  • NEW CO-OP ENDURANCE MODE: Work together to survive the elements
  • NEW LARA’S NIGHTMARE MODE: Fight hordes of zombies and defend Croft Manor
  • FIVE CLASSIC LARA CROFT IN-GAME MODELS: Play as your favorite in expedition mode!
  • EIGHT OUTFITS, SEVEN WEAPONS AND OVER 35 EXPEDITION CARDS
  • ALL PREVIOUSLY RELEASED PRE-ORDER OUTFITS, WEAPONS AND EXPEDITION CARDS.
  • NEW EXTREME SURVIVOR DIFFICULTY SETTING FOR THE MAIN CAMPAIGN.
  • NEW COLD WEATHER OUTFIT AND WEAPON INSPIRIED BY TOMB RAIDER III.
  • Some smaller DLCs

GOG Version Features:

  • Marketplace functions including buying, opening, and selling cards are now handled offline.
  • Player card inventory and credits are now stored locally instead of remote storage.
  • Expeditions have been reworked with offline leaderboards and rewards.
  • Croft Manor is now fully playable without needing any online connection.
Selective Download

You can skip downloading of language files you don’t need.

  • fg-selective-english.bin (also required for Dutch users)
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-selective-korean.bin
  • fg-selective-polish.bin
  • fg-selective-portuguese.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin
  • fg-selective-mexican.bin
  • fg-selective-chinese.bin (includes both Simplified and Traditional)
  • fg-selective-arabic.bin (Version for Saudi Arabia, has “prophet” word censored. Delete all files with KSA in name to remove censorship; English files are also required for the installation)

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-03).

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS EXTREMELY backwards compatible with my previous RotTR repack. The only changed/new files are setup.exe, fg-03.bin & fg-04.bin, so you need to download just 35 MB of new data.

The post Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration – v1.0.1.2 GOG + All DLCs appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

  • Based on Burden.of.Truth-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-burden.of.truth.iso (4,601,387,008 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.0.7
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • Bonus OST in FLAC format nullified, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of bonus OST in MP3 format
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 4.3 to 1.1/1.5 GB)
  • Installation takes one minute
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 4.3 GB
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
Burden of Truth is the next entry in the Burden of Proof saga, marking the return of this grand courtroom adventure! Experience the missing chapter from the original story which has been restored & fleshed out into a full game. Gather evidence by investigating the crime scene, find contradictions in the courtroom, and confront the truth with everything you have!

Burden of Truth continues RobProductions’ iconic hybrid-genre experience with third person investigations and challenging logic puzzles that test your knowledge of each case. Explore the crime scene as you survey full 3D environments for traces of the culprit. Collect evidence and make surprising deductions via the new tagging system, which highlights more information about the status of each clue. Hold people accountable by tracking the source of each item added to the court record, or utilize on-hand items to get out of dangerous situations.

Then, make your case in the courtroom by cross-examining witnesses and presenting evidence that favors your argument. As legal counsel, you get to choose when to object and when to hold back, but be warned; the judge and his counselors grow weary with every faulty step, so be sure to back up your claims with concrete proof. As you make choices that affect the course of the trial, new discoveries can be made that contradict previous testimony. With logic as your weapon, search for the erroneous statement within the witness’ assertions and take the fight to them!

The outcome of the case is in your hands. As such, the burden lies with you to deduce the truth and deliver justice for those that have been wrongly accused!

Game Features

  • Uncover the missing link showcasing Cross’ transition from a steadfast prosecutor to a legendary defense attorney.
  • Experience new & familiar locations from Burden of Proof with completely overhauled graphics.
  • Choose when to object in court & discover your own path to victory.
  • Collect evidence at the crime scene & present it later to further your case.
  • Utilize the new hint system to customize the puzzle difficulty.
  • Expose shocking lies within witness testimonies via the new evidence tagging system.
  • 4k screen support & compatible with any framerate.
  • Native versions for macOS, Windows, and Linux.
  • Support for common input hardware, including the Xbox & DualSense controllers.
  • Complete subtitle support and other common accessibility features.
  • Full original soundtrack & album release.

The post Burden of Truth: Deluxe Edition – v1.0.7 + Bonus OST appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on Arcane.Path-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-arcane.path.iso (1,680,013,312 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 1.6 GB to 740 MB)
  • Installation takes 1-2 minutes

  • HDD space after installation: 1.4 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
You awaken as a Doll in a desolate, crumbling city with no memories. The path to the Royal Palace lies ahead, but hostile automatons and arcane golems stand in your way. To reach your destination, you must face powerful foes, each guarding a crucial place of your journey.

Every encounter challenges you to maximize the use of your magic cards, artifacts, and skills. Choose your moves carefully, adapt to enemy patterns, and unleash powerful combos to vanquish each foe.

Before each run in Arcane Path, you’ll choose one of the 12 artifacts that shape your gameplay. Each artifact grants unique status effects, enhances starting cards with powerful bonuses, and adds thematic cards to your deck. Artifacts also influence battle rewards, ensuring key victories provide cards aligned with the artifact’s theme, which in turn offer new strategies and playstyles.

An ancient book whispers of forgotten powers tied to the 12 relics and the forces that set your quest in motion. Its cryptic pages reveal the marvels of a bygone era, hinting at a fateful ritual that left the city in ruins.

Claviger, the owl mask automaton, and her leader, Emerald Oracle, offer their aid on your path to the heart of the enchanted city.

The post Arcane Path appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

  • This game requires a controller in order to play. Playing with a keyboard and mouse isn’t supported.

  • HDD space after installation: 8.4 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
There’s No Case Snoopy Can’t Solve!

Join Snoopy and the gang in an all-new mystery adventure packed with charm, clever puzzles, and heartwarming friendships! Step into Snoopy’s paws and detective hat as you explore the town, solve challenging cases, and uncover hidden secrets – with help from the lovable Peanuts gang.

Whether you’re investigating strange happenings at the school, chasing clues through the forest, each case is filled with brain-teasing challenges and unexpected surprises. Build your own team of four from familiar friends such as Peppermint Patty, Lucy, Marcie, Schroeder, Franklin and others – each bringing their own special skills to the case.

Lighthearted, witty, and full of classic Peanuts charm, this feel-good action-puzzle adventure is ideal for both the young and the young at heart!

Game Features

  • PLAY AS SNOOPY!: Snoopy’s on the case as you take charge of The Great Mystery Club! Build your custom squad of the lovable Peanuts gang – each with unique abilities and quirky strengths that bring fun and strategy to every puzzle.
  • EXPLORE ICONIC LOCATIONS: Journey through the town as you solve mysteries and puzzles. Visit the gang’s school, the iconic music hall, Charlie Brown’s house, the baseball field, the Kite eating tree, and more as you uncover surprises and twists!
  • SNOOPY’S ON THE CASE: Switch between Snoopy’s personas – Detective, Beagle Scout, Fierce Pirate, and more – to solve puzzles with clever tools like a leaf blower, a super-sleuth’s magnifying glass, a trusty metal detector, and more. Each role unlocks fun new ways to crack part of the case!
  • MYSTERY CLUB MINI-GAMES: Take some swings at home plate, try kicking the football, work in the lab, play a tune, and race to the finish! Have a blast with baseball, football, crafting, memory tests, object hunts, piano playing, soapbox derbies – and take flight in the legendary Sopwith Camel to chase down the Red Baron!
  • A STORY PACKED WITH HEART & HUMOR: Enjoy humorous and delightful encounters and an emotional story that celebrates the power of friendship, teamwork, and staying true to who you are.
  • INTERACTIVELY IMMERSERSE YOURSLE IN THE WORLD PEANUTS: With its charming creative direction and gameplay, enjoy a visually stunning adventure that combines modern, soft graphics with the nostalgic, adventurous tone of the beloved Peanuts brand.

The post Snoopy & The Great Mystery Club: Deluxe Edition + Joe Cool Fun Pack DLC appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Game Description
In Knock on the Coffin Lid you wake up in a cold crypt a thousand leagues from home, devoid of memories of what has happened, and in the company of an enigmatic stranger. To return lost memories you will have to examine the dark secrets of your own death, form unexpected alliances and carefully plan your route.

RETURN HOME
Set off on a journey across three mysterious regions in order to return home and untangle a web of deadly intrigues. On your way you will meet many new friends â€“ as well as those who only want to appear as such.

CHANGE THE WORLD
Decide what your world will look like after you ascend to the empty throne of the Northern Gate. Will the goblins remain slaves, or will they rule over the orcs in the Crimson Steppes? Will the elves be wiped from the face of the earth? Who will become the dominating force in the Northern Gate?

SMITE YOUR ENEMIES
Collect powerful artifacts, build unbeatable decks and fight the leaders of factions that try to dispute your authority.

UNRAVEL THE HEROESâ€™ SECRETS
Learn the secrets of the three main heroes and their antagonists. Unlock 12 original subclasses in order to appreciate the depth of the game play and enliven your game experience.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS slightly backwards compatible with my previous KotCL repacks. You can rehash fg-optional-bonus-content.bin to save 496 MB of traffic.

Repack Features

  • Based on Heroic.Songs.the.Remix-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-heroic.songs.the.remix.iso (5,887,266,816 bytes)
  • Install the game to a SHORT PATH, like the setup suggests, otherwise you may face installation/gameplay issues
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of videos in oriental languages
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 5.5 GB to 934 MB/2.1 GB)
  • Installation takes one minute
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 5.5 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
Heroic Songs: the Remix! is an Idol x City-Building Simulation Game where you help develop a land known as the Void while guiding the main heroine, Akari Sunohara, on her journey to become an idol. Build roads and facilities, attract new residents, and transform this desolate world into a vibrant Fanctuary worthy of the spotlight!

Game Features

  • A Diverse Lineup of Buildings – With over 50 unique buildings, you’ll have plenty of ways to shape your city! As you progress, you’ll unlock building styles inspired by the other worlds you visit – fantasy, sci-fi, Japanese, and modern-day aesthetics. And don’t forget to check out the diverse designs of your Fans, who arrive from across the multiverse to support their oshi!
  • Idol Stages – By constructing personal stages, idols will perform for their Fans by singing and dancing in town! Idols with stages become available for Concerts and Tours, and will boost the surrounding buildings whenever they’re present. As idols gain experience from performances, their levels rise – enhancing those building effects even further! You can also assign skill points to customize how their influence spreads across your city.
  • Concerts – Concerts are short, 30-second rhythm games. Keep in time with the music to hit the target score and clear the stage! Successful Concerts will unlock new story content, boost idol and Fan experiences, and provide rewards. Some idols will also unlock alternate stage outfits as you progress through the game.
  • A Wild Yet Heartfelt Story Unfolds! – Progress through successful concerts, construction projects, and city development to unlock new chapters in the story. Follow Akari Sunohara – an ordinary girl with a love for idols – as she discovers her true calling. Dive deeper into each of the five main heroines in dedicated Character Stories, and experience each idol’s unique charm!

The post Heroic Songs: The Remix! appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

item.title: Battle Suit Aces – v1.0.283 + Bonus OST

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on Battle.Suit.Aces-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-battle.suit.aces.iso (4,868,046,848 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.0.283
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • Bonus OST in WAV format nullified, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of bonus OST in MP3 format
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 4.5 GB to 821 MB/1.1 GB)
  • Installation takes 3-6 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 4.5 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
From the creators of Battle Chef Brigade comes Battle Suit Aces, a charming card-battling RPG. You’ll recruit, befriend, and upgrade mech pilots on a heartfelt hunt for alien superweapons: the Relic Suits. Command them across monster-infested galactic wilds through sci-fi shenanigans and disasters.

Embark on a heartfelt journey through the stars on the USS Zephyr, joining Captain Heathcliff and his ragtag crew as they search the galaxy for fabled Relic Suits. Sojourn through monster-infested galactic wilds, leading your crew through danger, tragedy, and comedic sci-fi shenanigans.

CARD COMBAT – Each turn, deploy your hand-picked pilots to the Battle Line. Decide who should attack the incoming monsters, shield your Ship, or be swapped out for a fresh Battle Suit. Will you hit every enemy at once with the boisterous Daciana or target the heart of the problem with the analytical Yan? Pilot abilities play off each other, inviting you to try new pilot and mod combinations against ever-evolving foes. To grow your crew and deck of mecha cards, you’ll forge bonds with space pirates, paranormal investigators, starball athletes, and more. Each Faction offers a unique battle style along with their set of eccentric pilots.

CHARMING ADVENTURE – Inspired by old-school mecha anime, Battle Suit Aces is about saving the galaxy with your found family using ancient alien superweapons. Enter into the hand-crafted world, filled with thoughtful and stylish characters prepared to dazzle. Your personalized adventure is determined by the Factions you court, the pilots you befriend, and the dialogue choices you make. From kicking out oceanside oppressors, infiltrating corrupt corporate facilities, attending a Battle Suit gala, competing in starball, and so much more, your journey truly reflects the choices you make in the game. Get to know your crew’s strengths and strategically deploy them in battle. Uncover the rich lives of over 50 fully-voiced characters and learn what makes them tick. Charming, vibrant art reminiscent of your favorite anime comes to life while the orchestral soundtrack welcomes you into the whimsically warm atmosphere.

LIVELY SHIP – Between missions, spend time on your bustling ship. Get to know your endearing crew over a meal, practice card synergies in the Sim Chamber, craft handy Drones, install powerful mods in your favorite cards, upgrade your ship to support your pilots in battle, handle Faction bounties, and plot a course to your next mission. Mod and battle slots are limited, so prepare carefully. You’ll need a varied deck to counter Battle Suit Aces’ suite of villains, who have dangerous abilities and synergies of their own. Your unique build and deployment strategy lets you maximize impact and time with your favorite crewmembers.

Welcome aboard! The Second Voice is calling. Will you listen?

Game Features

  • Enter a mecha and monster-filled world from the award-winning Battle Chef Brigade team.
  • Embark on a personalized adventure full of memorable fully-voiced characters.
  • Carefully guide your eager pilots to win streamlined 5 vs 5 card battles.
  • Add to your deck from 5 specialist Factions and mod them into a synergistic team.
